recipeDesc: A traditional Malay dish served with coconut rice, sambal, and various sides.
preparationSteps: Cook the rice with coconut milk.Prepare the sambal by frying chili paste, onions, and anchovies.Serve with boiled egg, fried anchovies, peanuts, and cucumber slices.

recipeDesc: A healthy chicken salad with fresh vegetables.
ingredients: Chicken breast, Lettuce, Tomatoes, Cucumbers, Olive oil, Vinegar
preparationSteps: Grill the chicken breast and slice it. Mix lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers in a bowl. Add olive oil and vinegar, then top with grilled chicken slices.

recipeDesc: A warm and comforting chicken soup.
ingredients: Chicken, Carrots, Onions, Celery, Garlic, Salt, Pepper
preparationSteps: Boil chicken in water with salt and garlic. Add carrots, onions, and celery. Simmer until the vegetables are tender and serve hot.

recipeDesc: A rich and moist chocolate cake.
ingredients: Flour, Sugar, Cocoa powder, Butter, Eggs, Milk
preparationSteps: Mix the dry ingredients together. Add wet ingredients and stir until smooth. Bake at 180Â°C for 35 minutes.

recipeDesc: Crispy fried chicken with a golden-brown crust.
preparationSteps: Season chicken pieces with spices. Coat them in flour and fry in hot oil until crispy and golden.

recipeDesc: Delicious fried crab seasoned with spices.
preparationSteps: Clean the crabs and season with spices. Coat in flour and deep fry until golden brown.

recipeDesc: A refreshing kiwi juice full of vitamins.
preparationSteps: Peel and blend kiwis with water and sugar. Serve over ice.

recipeDesc: Classic Italian spaghetti with tomato sauce.
ingredients: Spaghetti, Tomato sauce, Garlic, Onions, Olive oil
preparationSteps: Boil spaghetti until al dente. Cook tomato sauce with garlic and onions. Mix the sauce with the spaghetti and serve.

ingredients: Noodles, Broccoli, Carrots, Bell peppers, Soy sauce
preparationSteps: Stir fry the vegetables in a pan. Add cooked noodles and soy sauce, stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
